H3.text: Which city hosted the 1980 Summer Olympics, which were boycotted by over 60 nations. Mosc√∫

A4.text: The 1980 Summer Olympics were held in Moscow, Soviet Union, in present-day Russia.

A5.text: The only two cities to bid for the 1980 Summer Olympics were Moscow and Los Angeles.
